biography: Riku, brother of the esteemed Panu, hails from the prestigious Kotojärven Kartanogolf. A man of quiet contemplation, Riku approaches the game with a calculated precision that belies his jovial nature off the course.

While Riku has graced the Hector Trophée on one occasion, his impact on the tournament is undeniable. Though he may not be competing in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his presence will surely be missed by fellow competitors and spectators alike.
Known for his strategic prowess and unwavering determination, Riku has left an enduring mark on the tournament, and his contributions to the sport are greatly appreciated.
